review: I love my fire stick! I bought this item on prime day for a discounted price and I am very satisfied! I love that my Kindle syncs up with the fire stick. I am able to watch shows and movies from prime instant video on my TV instead of watching them on the small screen of my Kindle. It is very user friendly and easy to navigate.

review: My wife and i love the fire stick. We used the fire stick while on vacation. We connected the stick to our hotel tv snd watched orange is the new black all 3 nights. If you have access to free wifi @ your hotel I recommend you take it. Overall we love our amazon fire stick

review: We've owned and used the Fire TV Stick for several months. It has worked flawlessly on all of our TVs. The only limitation we have noticed is some shows or series are not included with our Prime membership, which is to be expected. Even so, the availability of programming is impressive and we are totally satisfied with our $39 Fire TV purchase as well as our $99/year Amazon Prime membership.
